name: UnSpellable
description:
Unspellable is a game where magic isn't as 'romanticized' as in other games. It is a hard to master art. So, our protagonist is a failed apprentice of a famous wizard on a quest of finding his fortune. Combine magic schools to defeat enemies, but be careful not to turn yourself into a sheep in the process.

Controls

  • Use A, S and D to create a spell. 
  • Hold and release Spacebar to cast it.
  • Use Arrows to move.
